subject: Good day.
body:
Good day.
We want to get this very clear to you. This is Postal Shipping Office
USA, We have been notified by the USA Authority and Deposited An ATM
Card Parcel content of $5.5 Million United State Dollars which is your
contract/ inheritance approved fund here in our payment Center. And we
are instructed to contact you and make sure that this Parcel will be
delivered to you without any further delay.
This Parcel was signed by the USA IMF and Approved by the Office of
the High Court of Claim for immediate delivery to you. So are you
really the rightful owner of this Parcel if yes then we need you to
send us with your Full names in any ID Card or Driver license or your
name in Passport for our Confirmation before we can proceed to get
this Parcel delivery to you. Also we need you to forward us with your
full Delivery Details your full names country state city and home
address with your Cell phone number now OK. Waiting your immediate
attention right back if you are the real owner of this Email Address.
THEN THE GOOD NEWS TODAY, We have made a solid arrangement with the
Authority because delay is very Dangerous now on your delivery Parcel
of ATM card sum of$5.5 Million USD and you are finally required to pay
only ($200,usd) to update your file Quickly now and your delivery will
be done immediately with fully Assurance. So hurry up, get the only
$100,usd and your delivery will be done immediately with immediate
effect today OK. Mind you that we don't take any delay here anymore.
If you are not ready to receive this Parcel delivery today then this
Parcel will be canceled immediately today and returned back to the
High Court of Claim immediately. This is our 100% Guaranteed today. Do
not delay today because delay is very dangerous.
I REPEAT AGAIN.Your delivery Parcel is ready waiting here since and
your delaying is very Dangerous over this your parcel delivery. Please
kindly stop delaying to avoid losing your parcel of funds okay. We
have received your details and we have cross checked with our file
here and it's confirmed that you are the rightful person we need to
reach for the ATM CARD Sum of $10.9Million United State Dollars. And
we are in your delivery process now.
The only thing needed was to Renew your Delivery Approval File before
your delivery will take place which costs you only ($50,USD) Only.
Immediately you get us this Delivery File Approval Renewal Fee of only
$50,USD that all and we will be finalized immediately and your Parcel
will be delivered to your Destination immediately within a few hours
today with our immediate action.
Mind you that we don't take any delay here. If you are not ready to
receive this Parcel delivery today then this Parcel will be canceled
immediately and returned back to the High Court of Claims immediately.
This is our 100% Guaranteed today.
Thanks.
Mrs Rita Allen,
Postal Shipping Office USA,

subject: Re:   Good day.
body:
Hello Mrs. Rita Allen,

Thank you for reaching out to me from the Postal Shipping Office USA. I'm quite surprised to hear about this ATM Card Parcel containing a million United States Dollars. It's not every day that one receives such news!

I understand that you need my full name and delivery details for the process. However, before we proceed, could you please provide more information about how this parcel came into existence? How was it determined that I am the rightful owner of this parcel?

Also, you mentioned something about a Delivery Approval File Renewal Fee. Could you explain what this fee is for and why it is necessary? 

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Pamela
